# Setup

Specify the location of required raw data files in a `.Renviron` file in the root directory of this project:

```{r}
library(magrittr)
targets::tar_read(RENVIRON) %>%
  readLines() %>%
  purrr::map_chr( ~ stringr::str_replace(
    string = .x,
    pattern = "=.*$",
    replacement = "="
  )) %>%
  stringr::str_c(sep = "",
                 collapse = "\n") %>%
  cat()
```
